articles.description: OnePlus introduces AI Eraser, a new photo editing tool for select devices. With a few taps, users can remove unwanted objects, joining Google and Samsung in AI-powered editing.
articles.content: OnePlus has joined the league of smartphone giants integrating AI technology into image editing with its latest innovation, the AI Eraser' feature. This innovative tool, powered by the company's uniq… [+2467 chars]

articles.author: Andy Meek, Andy Meek
articles.title: YouTube CEO to OpenAI: Don't use our videos to train Sora - BGR
articles.description: Google: We can use publisher content to train our AI. Also Google: OpenAI is not allowed to use our YouTube videos to train its own AI.

articles.author: Danny Milton
articles.title: Introducing The Black Snoopy MoonSwatch Arrives In Time For The New Moon - HODINKEE
articles.description: We got white in March and now black in April as a new non-limited Snoopy-themed Mission To Moonphase is set to launch.
articles.content: We all went bonkers all over again with MoonSwatch fever when the Mission to Moonphase, aka the Snoopy MoonSwatch, arrived just 10 (10!) days ago. We knew it was coming; we just didn't know when. And… [+599 chars]
